amendment.description: Amendment sought to make the total appropriations made in this Act (other than appropriations required to be made by a provision of law) are hereby reduced by $750,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make the total appropriations made in this Act (other than appropriations required to be made by a provision of law) are hereby reduced by $750,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 261 (Roll no. 740).
